title: Computer Vision
content:
Core Tasks

  • Classification: Image categorization
  • Detection: Locating objects in images
  • Segmentation: Pixel-level classification
  • Generation: Creating new visual content

Deep Learning Approaches

  • Convolutional Networks: CNN architectures and innovations
  • Vision Transformers: Attention-based image processing
  • Generative Models: GANs, diffusion models

Relevant Papers from Your Collection

Analysis of computer vision research highlighted in your reading materials.
